markdown:
Skip to main content

## 

SkilledTradesBC Portal

The fastest and easiest way to submit information and will get you the quickest results is through our self-serve tool, the [SkilledTradesBC Portal](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/SignIn/). It provides a seamless, mobile-friendly experience for apprentices and sponsors looking to submit customer service requests, manage their information, submit work-based training hours, and more. 

New sponsor? Follow [_these steps_](/node/36#section--accordion--607) to register as a sponsor and receive access to the Portal after successful registration.

[ Sign Up for a Portal Account](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/Account/Login/Register)

## 

Forms

PDF forms can be first downloaded, filled out, then submitted them to [customerservice@skilledtradesbc.ca](mailto:customerservice@skilledtradesbc.ca). Some forms are available as web forms, which can be filled out online. 

Alternatively, these forms can be printed, filled out by hand, and mailed to our headquarters. 

Apprentice Forms

[Apprentice and Sponsor Registration](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/Account/Login/Register) (submit through SkilledTradesBC Portal)

  * To register your apprenticeship with SkilledTradesBC for ALL programs except Youth Work in Trades/Youth Train in Trades Programs.



[Work-based Training Report](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/SignIn/) (submit through SkilledTradesBC Portal)

  * To report work-based training hours for your apprentice.



[Exam Application Form](/media/1781/download)

  * To schedule a Certification Exam and/or Standard Level Exam and to submit requests for exam supports.



[Level Placement Exam Application Form](/media/2236/download)

  * Apply to write a level exam for placement into the apprenticeship program in any applicable trades.



[Proof of Upgrading](/media/696/download)

  * Used by exam candidates who require proof of upgrading for their 4th exam attempt.



[Translator/Reader Declaration](/media/701/download)

  * To be completed by the Translator or Reader assisting you in your exam.



[Request for Document Replacement](/media/451/download)

  * To request a replacement for a lost, stolen or damaged certificate, wallet card, registration card or logbook.



[Completion Form – Welder](/media/456/download)

  * Send this form along with logbook for assessment of your training and work hours in order to receive a Welding stamp (certification).



[Recommendation for Certification – Welder](/media/454/download)

  * To recommend certification for a Welder apprentice who has completed all work-based training hours and competencies.



[Work-based Training Report – Multi-Process Alloy Welding Endorsement Declaration](/media/1772/download)

  * To confirm that the candidate has at least 900 hours of experience in processes directly related to the Multi-Process Alloy Welding (MPAW) Endorsement achieved after Red-Seal Certification.



[Heavy Equipment Operator Completion Declaration Forms](/heavy-equipment-operator)

  * See [HEO trade page](/heavy-equipment-operator) for forms to be submitted by apprentices seeking HEO endorsements on the Certificate of Qualification.



[Foundation Exemption Request Heavy Equipment Operator](/media/1765/download)

  * To exempt an apprentice from the Road Builder & Heavy Construction foundation program that is a pre-requisite for registration into the Heavy Equipment Operator apprenticeship program.



[Work-Based Training Proximity Verification Declaration Utility Arborist](/media/458/download)

  * To confirm that a Utility Arborist apprentice has worked at least 1200 hours in close proximity to energized electrical equipment.



[Recommendation for Certification - Asphalt Paving/Laydown Technician](/media/1760/download)

  * To recommend certification for a Asphalt Paving/Laydown Technician apprentice who has completed all work-based training hours and competencies.



[Registration – Youth Work in Trades](/media/1762/download)

  * To register your apprenticeship with SkilledTradesBC in the Youth Work in Trades programs. Please send to your local school district.



Exam Forms

[Exam Application Form](/media/1781/download)

  * To schedule a Certification of Qualification or Red Seal Exam and to submit requests for exam supports.



[Level Placement Exam Application Form](/media/2236/download)

  * Apply to write a level exam for placement into the apprenticeship program in any applicable trades.



[Tower Crane Operator Level Placement Exam Application Form](/media/2740/download)

  * Apply to write a level exam for placement into the Tower Crane Operator apprenticeship program.



[Proof of Upgrading](/media/696/download)

  * Used by exam candidates who require proof of upgrading for their 4th exam attempt.



[Translator/Reader Declaration](/media/701/download)

  * To be completed by the Translator or Reader assisting you in your exam.



Sponsor Forms

[Apprentice and Sponsor Registration](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/Account/Login/Register) (submit through SkilledTradesBC Portal)

  * To register apprenticeships with SkilledTradesBC for ALL programs except Youth Work in Trades/Youth Train in Trades Programs.



[Work-based Training Report](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/SignIn/) (submit through SkilledTradesBC Portal)

  * To report work-based training hours for your apprentice.



[Add-Remove Staff](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/add-remove-staff) (Web Form)

  * To update your organization’s file with a list of individuals who can update or view the apprentice records.



[Request for Document Replacement](/media/451/download)

  * To request a replacement for a lost, stolen or damaged certificate, wallet card, registration card or logbook.



[Recommendation for Certification – Welder](/media/454/download)

  * To recommend certification for a Welder apprentice who has completed all work-based training hours and competencies.



[Work-based Training Report – Multi-Process Alloy Welding Endorsement Declaration](/media/1772/download)

  * To confirm that the candidate has at least 900 hours of experience in processes directly related to the Multi-Process Alloy Welding (MPAW) Endorsement achieved after Red-Seal Certification.



[Heavy Equipment Operator Completion Declaration Forms](/heavy-equipment-operator)

  * See [HEO trade page](/heavy-equipment-operator) for forms to be submitted by apprentices seeking HEO endorsements on the Certificate of Qualification.



[Foundation Exemption Request Heavy Equipment Operator](/media/1765/download)

  * To exempt an apprentice from the Road Builder & Heavy Construction foundation program that is a prerequisite for registration into the Heavy Equipment Operator apprenticeship program.



[Work-Based Training Proximity Verification Declaration Utility Arborist](/media/458/download)

  * To confirm that a Utility Arborist apprentice has worked at least 1200 hours in close proximity to energized electrical equipment.



[Recommendation for Certification - Asphalt Paving/Laydown Technician](/media/1760/download)

  * To recommend certification for an Asphalt Paving/Laydown Technician apprentice who has completed all work-based training hours and competencies.



Request for Reviews of Decision or Order Form

[Request for Review of Decision or Order Form](/media/469/download)

  * The Request for Review of a Decision or Order Form is used to submit a request to SkilledTradesBC Review Officer. 



Training Provider Forms

[Designation Application Form](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/sites/default/files/2024-01/02%20Designation%20Application%20Form.pdf)

  * Used by a private training institution to apply for SkilledTradesBC Recognized Training Provider status.



[SkilledTradesBC Portal Registration](/media/457/download)

  * Used by a SkilledTradesBC Recognized Training Provider to create an individual SkilledTradesBC account when a student is in a Foundation or Modular Welder program



[Class Examination Request](/media/700/download)

  * Used by a SkilledTradesBC Recognized Training Provider to request SkilledTradesBC exams for their students.



[Training Provider Accommodated Examination Request](/media/2587/download)

  * Used by students of a SkilledTradesBC Recognized Training Provider to request an accommodation for their SkilledTradesBC exam. 



[Accessibility Resource Centre (ARC) Exam Request ](/media/2648/download)

  * Used by students and their support staff to request to write their SkilledTradesBC Exam at their SkilledTradesBC Recognized Training Provider's Accessibility Resource Centre (ARC). 



[Practical Assessment Result Report](/media/1506/download)

  * Used by a SkilledTradesBC Recognized Training Provider to report practical assessment results to SkilledTradesBC.



[Technical Training Result Report](/media/697/download) (Printable) or [Technical Training Result Report](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/technical_training_result_report) (Web Form)

  * Used by a SkilledTradesBC Recognized Training Provider to report a set of class marks to SkilledTradesBC upon completion of the course.



[Hairstylist Foundation Practicum Form (Sponsor)](/media/699/download) (Sponsor) 

  * Used by a SkilledTradesBC registered Sponsor to report the technical training requirement of a 300 hour practicum when a apprentice is in the Foundation program.



[Hairstylist Foundation Practicum Report (Training Provider)](/media/698/download) (Training Provider)

  * Used by a SkilledTradesBC Recognized Training Provider to report the technical training requirement of a 300 hour practicum for a Foundation program class. This form is to be sent in with the class marks.



[Youth Explore Trades Sampler Intake Form for Adults](/media/1763/download)

  * Used by a SkilledTradesBC Recognized Training Provider to register adult students to Youth Explore Trades Sampler class.



[Add-Remove Staff](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/add-remove-staff) (Web Form)

  * To update your organization’s file with a list of individuals who can update or view the apprentice records.



Privacy and Record Request Forms

[General Record Request ](/media/708/download)

  * To submit a general record request (including data requests) to SkilledTradesBC. For more information, visit SkilledTradesBC’s [General Record Request](/general-record-request) page.



[Personal Information Record Request](/media/709/download)

  * To submit a personal record request to SkilledTradesBC. For more information, visit SkilledTradesBC’s [Personal Information Record Request](/personal-info-record-request) page.



[Training Provider Record Request](/media/710/download)

  * If you are a training provider and you wish to submit a record request (including contact information requests) to SkilledTradesBC.



Miscellaneous Forms

[Add-Remove Staff](https://forms.skilledtradesbc.ca/add-remove-staff) (Web Form)

  * To update your organization’s file with a list of individuals who can update or view the apprentice records.



[Request for Document Replacement](/media/451/download)

  * To request a replacement for a lost, stolen or damaged certificate, wallet card, registration card or logbook.



[Publicity Agreement and Media Consent Form](/media/802/download)

  * Allows SkilledTradesBC permission to use your information including photos and video for the purpose of marketing and promotion of SkilledTradesBC programs and services.
  * Fill and sign [webform version](https://analytics.clickdimensions.com/cn/adufq/consent-form).



Policies &

Bylaws

List of legislations, bylaws, policies and factsheets related to BC's skilled trades training system

[ Learn More](/policies-and-bylaws)
